intents.treatment: Hi there, how can I help?
Have a nice day
Happy to help!
It could be an Allergy. The treatment for an allergy depends on what you're allergic to. In many cases your pharmacist will be able to offer advice and treatment

intents.disease: It could be an Ankle problem.
intents.treatment: It could be an Ankle problem. Speak to your community pharmacist or our healthcare professionals about taking medication or other methods of pain relief
It could be Anxiety. You can visit our GP and discuss all your treatment options
It could be Asthma. Reliever inhalers -usually blue - are taken to relieve asthma symptoms quickly
It could be Appendicitis. If you have appendicitis, your appendix needs to be removed as soon as possible

symptoms: swelling in the arms or legs
intents.treatment: It could be Kaposi's sarcoma. You can visit our Hospital and discuss all your treatments with our doctors

symptoms: pain in your side or lower back
intents.treatment: It could be Kidney infection. You can treat yourself with a course of antibiotic or you can visit our hospital
It could be Kidney stones. You can treat yourself with a course of antibiotic or you can visit our hospital
It could be Labyrinthitis.Drink plenty of liquid, little and often, particularly water, to avoid becoming dehydrated
It could be Lactose intolerance. Avoid consuming the milk products
It could be Laryngitis. Avoiding speaking when possible and only speaking softly when you need to
It could be Leg cramps. Do warm up excercise to relax your leg muscles
It could be lupus. You can visit our Hospital and discuss all your treatments with our doctors
It could be Coronavirus. Get tested as soon as possible and self-isolate yourself if you are positive
It could be Measles. Drink plenty of fluids and keep the body hydrated
It could be Mouth ulcer. Use antimicrobial mouthwash may speed up healing and prevent infection of the ulcer
It could be thyroid. You can visit our Hospital and discuss all your treatments with our doctors
It could be Psoriasis. You can visit our Hospital and discuss all your treatments with our doctors
It could be fungal infections. You may have fungal infection so contact your doctor for further treatment
It could be Yellow fever. You can visit our Hospital and discuss all your treatments with our doctors
